content: what a better way to show love than with matching u and me heart hat in youth and adult sizes brighten up the cold winter days by knitting and wearing this cute heart themed hat top it with a pompom and you are ready for a fun adventure you can easily modify the hat by adding stripes or making the hearts in two different colors this hat provides a nice introduction to stranded knitting using two colors in the stranded row it is recommended that you catch floats anytime you are working more than five stitches in a color to minimize impact on the design do your float catch on a different number of stitches with the row before and after if you want a smaller hat you can do so by adjusting down the needle size will you be my valentine i hope so by making and sharing this free pattern kay
